info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 06 at 9:10PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Ada, southwestern Boise, central Elmore and south central Gem Counties through 945 PM MDT... At 910 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Aldape Summit, or near Boise, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Hidden Springs and Bogus Basin Ski Area around 930 PM MDT. Emmett, Horseshoe Bend, Eagle and Harris Creek Summit around 940 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
